src:
Srbi odlični u tesnoj pobedi Virtusa, Cedevita dobila, Budućnost izgubila
06 Nov 2019, 23:55 by Milos
Kompletirano je šesto kolo Evrokupa.
U Partizanovoj B grupi, Limož je upisao drugi trijumf, nakon što je na svom parketu savladao Tofaš rezultatom Kod domaćih su se istakli Kriston sa 19, Invernici sa 16 i Konklin sa 15 poena, dok je u turskoj ekipi najefikasniji bio Met Lodžeski sa 21 poena.
Virtus je teškom mukom došao do pete pobede u grupi A. U Bolonji je pao Ulm sa 92:91, a njzaslužniji za trijumf bili su Miloš Teodosić i Stefan Marković sjajnom igrom u finišu. Teodosić je susret završio sa 15 poena i osam asistencija, dok je Marković dodao 12 poena uz devet dodavanja. Kod Ulma se istakao Džeret sa 20 koševa.
Cedevita Olimpija je zabeležila prvi trijumf u C grupi. Ekipa iz Ljubljane je iznenađujuće savladala Darušafaku u Istanbulu rezultatom 76:72. Pobednički tim predvodili su Filip Krušlin sa 17 poena i Mikael Hopkins, koji je dodao 15. Kod domaćih bolji od ostalih bio je Geri 17 poena i šest asistencija.
Budućnost je upisala i šesti poraz u grupi D. U Podgorici je slavila Unikaha sa 82:81. Džastin Kobs sa 26 poena i pet asistencija i Skot Bamfort sa postignutih18 koševa prednjačili su u domaćem sastavu. Kod gostiju se istakao Aksel Tupan sa 17 poena.
Rezultate šestog kola Evrokupa možete pogledati ovde.Tabelu Evrokupa možete pogledati ovde.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Serbs excellent in Virtus' close win, Cedevita won, Future lost
06 Nov 2019, 23:55 by Milos
The sixth round of the Eurocup was completed.
In Partizan's B group, Limoges won the second triumph after defeating Tofas on his parquet. The hosts stood out Kriston with 19, Inverness with 16 and Konklin with 15 points, while the Turkish team was most effective with Met Lodzeski with 21 points .
Virtus had a hard time in the fifth win in Group A. Ulm fell 92-91 in Bologna, with Milos Teodosic and Stefan Markovic scoring the most in the finish. Teodosic finished the game with 15 points and eight assists, while Markovic added 12 points with nine touchdowns. With Ulm, Jerret stood out with 20 points.
Cedevita Olympia recorded its first Group C triumph. The Ljubljana team surprisingly defeated Darushafak in Istanbul with a score of 76:72. The winning team was led by Filip Krushlin with 17 points and Mikael Hopkins, who added 15. Gary was 17 points and six assists better than the others.
Future also registered their sixth defeat in Group D. In Podgorica, they celebrated Unicah with 82:81. Justin Kobbs with 26 points and five assists and Scott Bamfort with 18 points lead in the home team. Aksel Tupan scored 17 points with the guests.
You can see the results of the sixth round of Eurocup here. You can see the Eurocup table here.
